Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) are in a complex mechanical-thermal-electrochemical multi-field coupling condition, and traditional calculation methods are difficult to study from different scales concurrently.
Titulo: Multi-scale simulations of fracture behavior in CeO2

Sentencas: In this paper, we use a multi-scale method to investigate the mechanical properties of ceria.
Titulo: Multi-scale simulations of fracture behavior in CeO2

Sentencas: This multi-scale method cannot only obtain the micro-processes such as pre-phase transformation, phase transformation, and fracture represented by molecular dynamics (MD) calculations, but also acquire the displacement and stress fields by the finite element method (FEM).
Titulo: Multi-scale simulations of fracture behavior in CeO2

Sentencas: A center-cracked model is used to study the crack propagation and stress distribution near the crack tip.
Titulo: Multi-scale simulations of fracture behavior in CeO2

Sentencas: In the [100] crystal orientation, a stress-induced martensitic phase transformation occurs near the crack tip, while the [111] crystal orientation shows the characteristics of brittle fracture of ceramic materials.
Titulo: Multi-scale simulations of fracture behavior in CeO2

Sentencas: The stress-strain relationship calculated by this multi-scale method compares well with the results of MD simulations, which attests to its accuracy.
Titulo: Multi-scale simulations of fracture behavior in CeO2
